label: Frequency Table
info: builds a contingency table, expresses table entries as fraction of marginal table, computes table margins and plots a mosaic

input_columns.label: variable(s)
input_columns.info: variable(s) selected to build the frequency table

input_margin.label: table margin
input_margin.info: For a contingency table in array form, compute the sum of table entries for each index.

input_prop.label: percentages
input_prop.info: Express Table Entries as Fraction of Marginal Table

input_color.label: colour
input_color.info: if true, uses a gamma-corrected grey palette, if false, gives empty boxes with no shading. Used only when shade is false.

input_shade.label: shade
input_shade.info: a logical indicating whether to produce extended mosaic plots, or a numeric vector of at most 5 distinct positive numbers giving the absolute values of the cut points for the residuals.
